original_title: Dasun Shanaka to lead Sri Lanka in ODIs against Afghanistan
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Cricket named a 16-member squad for the first two games of the ODI series against Afghanistan.
The three-match ODI series between Sri Lanka and Afghanistan will commence on June 2nd 2023 in Hambantota.
Wanindu Hasaranga is currently undergoing rehabilitation for a foot injury, and he will return to play once he is
Kusal Janith Perera was not picked for the ODI series as he is currently undergoing rehabilitation following a
hamstring injury he sustained during Sri Lanka’s tour of New Zealand.
